TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 表示 XML 签名的 <> 元素。

span.span: Represents the <> element of an XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示``的 XML 数字签名规范所定义的 XML 签名的元素。The class represents the `` element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. ``元素是的子元素``元素 (由表示类)，它描述公钥。The `` element is the subelement of the `` element (represented by the class) that describes an public key. ``元素包含对应于用于对文档进行数字签名的私钥的公钥。The `` element contains the public key that corresponds to the private key used to digitally sign a document. 文档的接收方使用的公钥来验证 XML 签名。A recipient of the document uses the public key to validate the XML signature. 使用类无论何时你想要将公钥添加到您的 XML 数字签名。Use the class whenever you want to add a public key to your XML digital signature. 如果密钥未显式提供给构造函数，一个新随机生成密钥对。If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new key pair is randomly generated. 有关详细信息``元素，请参阅 W3C www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 规范。For more information about the `` element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何生成和验证封装的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何生成和验证分离的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何生成和验证分离的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示要将添加到 XML 数字签名使用的公钥``子元素和``的子元素``元素。The property represents the public key to add to an XML digital signature using the `` subelement and the `` subelement of the `` element. 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C 规范。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
